title: Darkvision
content: mbers you plan to use while leaving the caster back in camp. If the caster of this spell removes it from their prepared spells list, the spell's effect will end immediately. For Creatures with Darkvision, Darkness is treated as Dim Light, and Dim Light is treated as Bright Light. They can see in pure darkness up to 12m, but other creatures can still hide from you as it is still considered as"Dim Light" for you. You can also completely see creatures in Dim Light as it is treated as "Bright Light"
